error.unknow: An unknown error is preventing communication with the server. Please check your connection and try again.
error.forbidden: You are not authorized to consume this resource.
error.unauthorized_method: Server error 405. Please escalate to technical support, thank you for your understanding.
error.service_unavailable: The resource is not available, please try again later.
error.not_found: Server error 404, resource not found. Please escalate to technical support, thank you for your understanding.
